title: “Shadow boyfriends” may help single Japanese women feel more secure at home
text:
“Shadow boyfriends” may help single Japanese women feel more secure at home 9:28am EDT - 01:02 
Behind the apartment's curtain, a tough guy is boxing, making any passing criminal think twice before breaking in. But the image is nothing more than a projected shadow- one that a Japanese apartment management company hopes will help protect and reassure women living by themselves. Jacob Greaves reports.
